demographics.ethnicity: Hispanic or Latino, Not Hispanic or Latino

tumor_characteristics.primary_site: Oral Cavity, Oropharynx, Larynx, Hypopharynx, Other
tumor_characteristics.tumor_stage: Stage I, Stage II, Stage III, Stage IVA, Stage IVB, Stage IVC
tumor_characteristics.tumor_grade: G1 (Well differentiated), G2 (Moderately differentiated), G3 (Poorly differentiated)
tumor_characteristics.tumor_size: T1, T2, T3, T4, T4a, T4b

genetic_data.note: Genetic data is optional. If not available, model will use clinical data only.

instructions: Fill in all clinical data fields
Use exact values from the options provided
Genetic data is optional but improves accuracy
Save as patient_XXX.json where XXX is patient number
Use this file with the prediction scripts
